name: Kujira's Hireling
text: Action: Spend 1 fate and select one - this character gets +1[conflict-military] and +1[conflict-political] until the end of the phase, or this character gets -1[conflict-military] and -1[conflict-political] until the end of the phase. Any player may trigger this ability. (Unlimited.) Card design by 2017 World Champion Samuel Benies.
